question: Which North East state recently announced Electric Vehicle Policy, 2021?
explanation:
The Meghalaya Electric Vehicle Policy, 2021 was recently announced by the state government of Meghalaya. It will come to effect from April 1 this year.
The dedicated policy has set a target of 15 per cent electric vehicle penetration by the year 2025. The plan involves providing incentives to limited early adopters of EV.
